channel.title: Carriers on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in Carriers on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: Add/edit carrier
item.description: The following call to action, the logo, and steps are displayed at each step while adding or editing a carrier Call to actionA call to action button at the top right is displayed: Cancel : Pressing the button redirects to the carriers listing page. A call to action button at the bottom right is displayed: Previous: In the first step, this button is disabled. Next: If there is an error, this button is disabled.

item.title: Carriers listing
item.description: Carriers listingThe “Carriers” page displays a list of all the current carriers. From here, it’s possible to directly change their status, indicate if shipping is free or not, and change their position in the front office. Call to actionA call to actions is displayed in the header of this page: Add new carrier ðŸ‘‰ See the specs of the add/edit carrier Settings wheelWhen clicking on the settings wheel, the following options are displayed:
